1388020.name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night Token Pack 143: Big Nasty Beasts
1388020.description:
Devin Night Token Pack 143: Big Nasty Beasts

Like nasty beasts, but much bigger and nastier. Mostly bigger.
This product contains:
  • Cyclopian Lich
  • Dark Dwarf Bow
  • Dark Dwarf Sword
  • Dark Dwarf
  • 2 Death Knights
  • Harpy Stormwitch
  • Imp Mischievous
  • Kobold Green Chief
  • Kobold Green Fighter
  • Kobold Green Shaman
  • Rat Armored Grenadier
  • Rat Bear
  • Rat Brawler
  • Rat Grenadier
  • Rat Ogre
  • Rat Sage
  • Rat Slaver Whip
  • Skeleton Archer Metalic
  • Skeleton Metalic
  • Skeleton Warrior Metalic
  • 2 Spider Dead
  • Spider Huntsman
  • Spider Jumping
  • Spider Recluse
  • Spider Red Banded
  • Spider Spitting
  • Spider Swarm
  • Spider Tarantula
  • Spider Tiger
  • Spider Trapdoor
  • Spider Wolf
  • Spider Hole
  • 11 Spider Webbed
  • Thoul
  • Were Bear
  • Were Boar
  • Were Tiger
  • Were Wolf
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:  
James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
